title: Judge blocks Trump administration from firing probationary employees
shortDescription: Judge William Alsup said Thursday that the firings of the probationary employees were likely unlawful.

title: Trump hosts UK prime minister at White House
shortDescription: President Donald Trump hosted Britain's Prime Minister Keir Starmer at the White House for critical talks on the war in Ukraine.

title: President Trump on calling Zelenskyy a dictator: 'Did I say that?'
shortDescription: President Trump softened his tone regarding Volodymyr Zelenskyy before a Friday meeting, declining to acknowledge he called him a "dictator."

title: Maine governor didn't say state wouldn't pay taxes | Fact check
shortDescription: Mills did not say this. A spokesperson for Mills said the claim is false.

title: When is The White House Easter Egg Roll? Here's how to get tickets
shortDescription: Families with children age 13 and under are invited to join President Donald Trump and the First Lady for a day of festivities.

title: Trump snags invite from King Charles for 2nd UK state visit
shortDescription: Trump will be the first elected leader in modern times to be hosted for two state visits by the British monarchy.

title: White House trying to rehire fired USDA bird flu officials
shortDescription: The Trump administration is reportedly trying to rehire USDA officials it fired over the weekend, who worked on the bird flu response.

title: Sen. Elissa Slotkin to offer Democrat's response to Trump's address
shortDescription: The first-term senator from Michigan will represent Democrats following President Trump's first joint address of his second term.

title: Judge refuses to prevent CIA from firing DEI workers under Trump order
shortDescription: The intelligence workers argued the CIA and Director of National Intelligence fired them for 'assumed' support of DEI rather than misconduct.

title: Lawmaker brings newborn to vote on House floor
shortDescription: Congresswoman Brittany Pettersen brought her newborn on the House floor to vote against Republican's budget, which ultimately passed.

title: Trump says 25% tariffs on Canada, Mexico are back on
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said tariffs on imports from Canada and Mexico will go into effect March 4 and intends to double tariffs on goods from China.
